resources.string: Thrilled by his experience with the Avengers, young Peter Parker returns home to live with his Aunt May. Under the watchful eye of mentor Tony Stark, Parker starts to embrace his newfound identity as Spider-Man. He also tries to return to his normal daily routine â€” distracted by thoughts of proving himself to be more than just a friendly neighborhood superhero. Peter must soon put his powers to the test when the evil Vulture emerges to threaten everything that he holds dear.

I started learning native Android development in the first week of January 2024. First, I learned Python for six months to understand programming basics. Then, I studied Java for three months to gain a deeper understanding of OOP concepts. Later, I began learning Android development with Kotlin, and I\'m still enjoying it a lot.

This project displays detailed information about movies and TV series. You can easily search for them and add them to your favorite collections. It utilizes the following features and concepts of Android development
